task_inception_20250822084700.title: Project Inception
task_inception_20250822084700.description: User request: I want to build a complete todo application

b957e9a2-0502-45ba-9147-c502d1430289.title: Gather Todo App Requirements
b957e9a2-0502-45ba-9147-c502d1430289.description:
Complete requirements analysis for the todo application including:
- User stories and acceptance criteria
- Functional and non-functional requirements
- UI/UX specifications
- Technology stack recommendations
- Integration requirements
- Performance and scalability needs

ae530919-eba3-4a73-8869-e8a97a220fa9.title: Requirements Gathering - Todo Application
ae530919-eba3-4a73-8869-e8a97a220fa9.description:
Conduct comprehensive requirements analysis for the Todo Application test project. This includes:
- User story creation and definition
- Functional requirements documentation  
- Non-functional requirements (performance, security, usability)
- Acceptance criteria definition
- Priority and effort estimation
- Technology constraints and preferences

This is part of the Agent Army coordination system test - focus on thorough documentation that can be handed off to system-architect for technical design.

6677cfd1-ebda-4db7-b684-b358bf280253.title: Technical Architecture Design - Todo Application
6677cfd1-ebda-4db7-b684-b358bf280253.description:
Design comprehensive technical architecture based on requirements from requirements-analyst. This includes:
- System architecture and component design
- Database schema and data models
- API design and endpoints
- Technology stack selection
- Security architecture
- Deployment strategy
- Performance considerations

Dependencies: Requires completion of requirements gathering task (ae530919-eba3-4a73-8869-e8a97a220fa9)

c8a1a568-1e81-4445-a4b6-db883a13029d.title: Sprint 1 Planning & Implementation Coordination - Todo Application
c8a1a568-1e81-4445-a4b6-db883a13029d.description:
Coordinate Sprint 1 implementation based on requirements and architecture. This includes:
- Sprint backlog creation from requirements
- Technical task breakdown based on architecture
- Team coordination and task assignment
- Implementation timeline and milestones
- Quality gates and acceptance criteria validation
- Development team coordination

Dependencies: Requires completion of both requirements and architecture tasks
